name: Enoki Omelet Patties
author: simonechow
summary: Got this recipe from a Chinese supermarket. They were making samples! Great for a light omelet. You get the great texture of enoki mushrooms in every bite! Extremely easy to make. Serve immediately and enjoy.
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages enoki mushrooms, coarsely chopped
1 small carrot, peeled and very finely chopped
2 pinches ground white pepper, or to taste
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed
directions: Mix mushrooms, green onion, and carrot together in a large bowl
Add eggs to mushroom mixture; stir until well combined
Season with white pepper; mix well
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat
Spoon about 2 tablespoons egg mixture for each patty into hot oil
Press patties lightly with the back of a spatula
Cook until bottom of patty is solid enough to flip, about 50 seconds
Flip and cook other side is lightly browned, 10 to 15 seconds
